duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement Analytics in one or more of the following - Finance, Supply Chain, Human Resources, Sales Order Management, Procurement.
Implement Analytics on one or more of the following data sources - Oracle EBS, PeopleSoft, SAP, JD Edwards.
Implement Analytics on one or more of the following tools - Tableau, Power BI, Oracle Analytics Cloud.
Implement Analytics on one or more of the Data Warehouse platforms - Snowflake, Oracle ADW, Azure Synapse, Redshift, Data Bricks.
Implement ETL Data Integration in one or more of the following tools - Oracle Data Integrator, Azure Data Factory, Snowpark, Informatica.
Amenability to do offshore (India) coordination i.e., working during hours that overlap with India time zone to a reasonable extent.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or related field (Master's preferred)
